opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Order affirmed.
Mr. Justice Boberts dissents.

casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Ahearn, Appellant.
Submitted January 10, 1972.
Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Boberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Manderino, JJ.
Edward L. Willard, Public Defender, for appellant.
Charles C. Brown, Jr., District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
March 20, 1972:
